name: Move or Die (itch) (larryli)
description:
Long long ago, in the Runeland, God's Relic was sealed. For every thousand years, the god will choose the bravest warrior and send them to the Runeland to fight for the Relic. Whoever gets it, will gain infinite power and will be qualified to rule the world. And you are the chosen ones, move now!

https://playingcards.io/bxpyya
